entry.title: Software Development Engineer at Zomato
entry.summary: Worked at Zomato in the Ad-Tech Team, in a tech team of about 20-30 people. I started working on the complete Ads Creation and Billing system where I worked on building better platforms to increase booked revenue. Worked on React.js, PHP and Golang to migrate the Ads Creation System from monolith written in PHP to Golang Microservice and Ads platform written in React.js Then I started ...
